<h3 id="X37837">X(37837)&nbsp;=&nbsp; X(1)X(227)&cap;X(3)X(960) </h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp;  a( -(b^2-c^2)^2 (b^2+c^2)+(b-c)^2 (3 b^3+b^2 c+b c^2+3 c^3) a+4 b (b-c)^2 c a^2+(-6 b^3+2 b^2 c+2 b c^2-6 c^3)a^3+(3 b^2-4 b c+3 c^2) a^4+3 (b+c) a^5-2 a^6) : :
<p>
See Angel Montesdeoca, <a href="https://groups.io/g/euclid/message/799"><b>Euclid 799 </b></a>.
</p>

<p>
X(37837) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1,11500}, {3,6261}, {960,9942}, {1490,12114}, {3811,22770}, {4297,6260}, {5534,12513}, {5709,12635}, {6256,18481}, {6326,22775}, {12119,12761} <br>
X(37837) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these {i,j}: {5450,13624}, {12616,140} <br>
</p>
